quran: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
as they charge into dawn raids,
as they drive right through the centre:
Truly, man is ungrateful towards his Lord,
and he even bears witness to this.
His love of wealth is vicious.
Does he not know that the contents of the graves will be brought forth,
and the secrets in the chests will be recorded?
Beyond doubt on that day, they will see that their Lord was fully aware of them.
